title: KKK members are committing mass suicide on the new currency.
subtitle: The story that Klan's members committed suicide after announcing that Harriet Tubman's photo would be posted on $20 bills came from a trick news site.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Sixty members of Klan committed suicide after it was announced that Harriet Tubman's photo would be posted on the $20 bill.
